tokens.text: Marriage is a complex topic with many subtopics.
The Jewish conception of marriage has roles for men and women.
One aspect is the idea of the woman as having a supporting role and less authority.
A corresponding responsibility of the husband is to take active responsibility for the physical and emotional well-being of everyone in the household.

There are cultures and hashkafas where the roles are less distinct, usually expecting less submission from the wife, and correspondingly less singular responsibility from the husband.
